entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
